name: Days of Memories 2
storyline:
In the first story ~Kare to Watashi no Atsui Natsu~ (彼と私の熱い夏, lit. "My Hot Summer with Him"), the protagonist is a 16 year old high school student, hoping to do something exciting during her summer.

In the second story ~Koi wa Good Job!~ (恋はグッジョブ！, lit. "Good Job at Love!"), the protagonist is a professional photographer who is searching for the next big model or scoop for his studio.

The third story ~Junpaku no Tenshitachi~ (純白の天使たち, lit. "Pure White Angels") takes place in a hospital and is a mystery-romance story. The protagonist is a patient, injured due to being trampled by a horse in the beginning.
summary: Days of Memories 2 is the second Nintendo DS compilation of SNK Playmore's mobile dating series games.
